findings.title: withdrawAmount() function might fail in some cases
findings.description: The withdrawAmount() function does not represent a strong logic and may lead to unexpected scenarios due to its design, specifically when calling the deposit() function within itself.

findings.title: withdrawAmount() function includes inadequate logic
findings.description: The withdrawAmount() function of the protocol doesn't represent a very strong logic as per the current architecture. The deposit() function that is called at the end of this function will require additional approval of tokens from the user in specific cases.
